authentication_screen.your_account_deactivated: Your account is deactivated, please contact us
authentication_screen.credential_already_in_use: The account corresponding to the credential already exists, or is already linked to a Firebase User.
authentication_screen.user_disabled: The user account has been disabled by an administrator.
authentication_screen.user_not_found: There is no user record corresponding to this identifier. The user may have been deleted.
